bibl.title: Lost in Tradition. Papyrus Commentaries on Comedies and Tragedies of Unknown Authorship. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Revised version of a contribution to the colloquium "La parola del poeta e la parola dell'interprete. Eruditi e grammatici nella cultura greca antica", organized by Franco MONTANARI at the "Fondation Hardt pour l'Étude de l'Antiquité Classique", Vandoeuvres (Geneva), 2nd-5th September 2008. - Examines the surviving exemplars of hypomnemata to dramatic adespota, investigating certain quantitative data, these exemplars' chronological distribution, as well as their characteristics as books.
